description: This Java test file located in the androidTest directory is used to verify that the testing infrastructure is correctly set up and that tests are discoverable by Gradle. It contains a minimal test class that does not execute any Android-dependent code.

classes.name: DiscoveryInstrumentedTest
classes.description: A minimal test class to ensure that the Android test infrastructure correctly discovers tests. It contains a single test method that always passes.

methods.name: discovery_runs
methods.description: A test method that asserts true to verify test discovery.
